channel.title: TEXTURE MISSING - Lambda Core Coolant Hub
channel.description:
So, on my first play through, when I returned to the Lambda Core Coolant Hub (where you have signs for coolant pumps 1 and 2), the aforementioned signs have lost their textures. This occurred again during my second play-through.
UPON ARRIVAL: [img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/39749281919395027/230F8476FCE2017D01F7C4E82CEC36845A4D5302/[/img] Upon return from Coolant System 01: [img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/39749281919395371/0F4F957387C89274C1D31D5716F8DE6998CC3AA5/[/img]

item.description:
So, on my first play through, when I returned to the Lambda Core Coolant Hub (where you have signs for coolant pumps 1 and 2), the aforementioned signs have lost their textures. This occurred again during my second play-through.
